content: Caged Heart of the Unconstrained Beast is a Druid Malignant Heart granting Super buffs. Caged Hearts are socketed into their corresponding colored sockets on your jewelry. Once inserted, hearts can be replaced, but NOT removed. These Malignant Hearts were introduced to Diablo 4 in Season 1 - Season of the Malignant. Caged Hearts can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. The effect of the for a short duration can be extended by getting kills. You cannot get an activation if you are already using . You do not need to be off cooldown for the activation to happen. You do not need to have on your Action Bar to trigger and it still benefits from all of its modifiers.
